title: Did Belucci say that Congress would not return "unless there was an emergency? '
subtitle: Both the United States Council and the Senate extended their holidays until May 4 because of the risks of the Corona virus.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The President of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Pelosi, announced during the CIVD-19 epidemic that Congress would be out of session "unless there was an emergency."
